__e: - Is it a pure coincidence that the voices directing you told you to do all the dark, secret little things you wanted to do anyway?
I mean, it was pure dumb luck... that he left them in an dead-end alley and they were shot... just two minutes later.
I'm sorry. I mean, it was an accident that I saw them, but I did. Yesterday.
Now, if this is your first time to hear this it may feel like:
Too much, and it fits too well, to be just coincidence.
Can't be the only one who thinks it's slightly coincidental they're both sick on the same day?
Although, just out of curiosity, what is it you do with that stuff?
But before you leave, just out of curiosity, why did your father work till late?
Well, just being curious, but how would you like to be spoken to that way?
